reviewText: It goes smoothly and straight into your heart. Love blossoms in our hearts and when we realize it is a feeling that is not comparable to anything else; a feeling that we feel for no one but the one we love... This is more or less what the Japanese dialogue says. Unfortunately, the English subtitle is simply bad, really bad, and in order to understand what is really going on and better appreciate it, you will need to understand Japanese. By the way, the live version also has a really bad English subtitle, but there is a version on You Tube with a decent English Subtitle.
TThis waas a cute romance school comedy. This had me with so many feelings through out the series. If u like love id strongly advise this anime
